name: Theo N' Temple
description:
EXPLORE THE TEMPLE AND TRY TO GET OUT OF IT!

Theo, a brave explorer, lived amazing adventures and note them all in his adventure book. Now, he will live one of the most remarkable ones. He is trapped inside a temple and he needs to complete challenges to escape from it.

What challenges Theo will face inside the Temple?

Single player puzzle game with cozy atmosphere
Funny interactions with the environment
A narrative that mixes enigmas and puzzle to give an unique experience.

Theo N' Temple was developed by Ant Studios for a school project.
